  • trical.misc.optimize

Source code for trical.misc.optimize

import numpy as np
from scipy import optimize as opt



[docs]def dflt_opt(ti):
    if ti.dim == 1:
        x_guess = np.linspace(-(ti.N - 1) / 2, (ti.N - 1) / 2, ti.N)
    else:
        x_guess = np.append(
            np.concatenate([np.zeros(ti.N)] * (ti.dim - 1)),
            np.linspace(-(ti.N - 1) / 2, (ti.N - 1) / 2, ti.N),
        )

    def _dflt_opt(f):
        res = opt.minimize(f, x_guess, method="SLSQP")
        assert res.success
        return res.x

    return _dflt_opt




[docs]def dflt_ls_opt(deg):
    def _dflt_ls_opt(a, b):
        res = opt.lsq_linear(a, b)
        assert res.success
        return res.x

    return _dflt_ls_opt
